scripts.commit: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; : "${MSG:?MSG is required}"; git add .; git commit -m "$MSG"'
scripts.push: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; b="${BRANCH:-$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD)}"; git push origin "$b"; git push origin --tags'
scripts.release:patch: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm commit && pnpm bump:patch && pnpm push'
scripts.release:minor: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm commit && pnpm bump:minor && pnpm push'
scripts.release:major: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm commit && pnpm bump:major && pnpm push'
scripts.ship:patch: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm release:patch && pnpm publish'
scripts.ship:minor: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm release:minor && pnpm publish'
scripts.ship:major: sh -lc 'set -euo pipefail; pnpm release:major && pnpm publish'
